metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14568 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Suricata before 4.0.5 stops TCP stream inspection upon a TCP RST from aserver. This allows detection bypass because Windows TCP clients proceedwith normal processing of TCP data that arrives shortly after an RST (i.e.,they act as if the RST had not yet been received).

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
